cause.description:
The Arlington Free Clinic provides comprehensive care through a network of physician specialists. The most recent additions to the services provided are physical therapy, psychiatric evaluations and counseling services. AFC also supports the medical professionals by providing laboratory tests, x-rays, medications and extensive case management without charge to the patients. All patients are residents of Arlington County, are living in low-income families and are without health insurance.
For more information, please visit www.arlingtonfreeclinic.org.
1. To provide healthcare for all Arlington residents who do not have affordable access to it.
cause.mission: The Arlington Free Clinic is a nonprofit, community based, volunteer driven organization committed to providing access to quality health care services to low-income, uninsured county residents.
cause.name: Arlington Free Clinic
